text: Discover a new approach to automating GitHub tasks with AI agents in this article on GitHub
Learn how to write GitHub actions in Markdown instead of complex YAML files.

Using AI agents, like GitHub Copilot, you can automate tasks like issue triage, pull

This method makes automation more accessible and secure through natural language instructions.
